RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6F Outer turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAMAN PRINCESS established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside shaking away through the latter portion of the turn given a notch to work with through swift splits, cut the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under growing lone threat to the outside and held on to prevail. TURRIGA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, closed well to issue a challenge inside the final furlong but was ultimately repelled to the finish. STRICTLY TABOO got bumped at the start by the veering out CERRETTA and in turn bumped NEIGH JUDE into SPLASHY knocking that rival sideways, chased just off the inside and then along the inside coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. CERRETTA veered out at the start bumping STRICTLY TABOO into NEIGH JUDE and in turn SPLASHY, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. SPLASHY got bumped solidly in the hindquarters getting knocked sideways by NEIGH JUDE due to pressure begun by the veering out CERRETTA, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. SHE'S A NATURAL coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside before tucking inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. WATCH OVER ME stumbled at the start, chased just off the inside and then along the inside through the turn, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and made no impact. NEIGH JUDE got bumped at the start by STRICTLY TABOO due to pressure from CERRETTA veering outwards and in turn bumped SPLASHY, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Turriga
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, closed well, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Cerretta
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Natural
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Shaman Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, shook away, cut corner, dug in, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Watch Over Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 2p, inside turn, inside 1/4, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Strictly Taboo
ENTRY.OWNER: Duncker, C. Steven and Quartucci, Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, ins turn, 3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Neigh Jude
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Splashy
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Rocco Steven Lee Jong and Cutair Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped solidly st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5w uppr, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRIC E OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNBRIDLED BOMBER was brought back to the paddock and had his bridle adjusted, stalked the pace on the outside in the three to four path, made a bid leaving the backstretch, fought on gamely with the runner-up in the stretch and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. DAYDREAMING BOY made light contact with a foe just after the start, went around the turn in the two path, settled at the rear, was roused while moving from the two path to the four path the far turn, rallied outside to get the lead in the five path into upper stretch, led while battling outside the winner into the final sixteenth but was denied. BOLD ENDEAVOR came out slightly while hustled from the start, showed the way on the inside, was asked under threat on the far turn, lost the advantage with three furlongs to run, fought under a drive in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened. SYSTEMIC CHANGE bumped lightly with a rival just after the start, prompted the pace on the outside in the two to three path, took the lead with three furlongs to run, lost the advantage into upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Endeavor
ENTRY.OWNER: Gurdon Andrew O Poyah Anil and Rodriguez Gustavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,ask2nd turn,headed3/8,drop back1/8,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Daydreaming Boy
ENTRY.OWNER: Bran Jam Stable and Clark David W
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump after brk,2p1st,at rear,ask 2-4w2nd,lead5p3/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Systemic Change
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump after brk,prompt out 2-3p,led3/8-1/4,drop back1/8,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Bomber
ENTRY.OWNER: Potash Edward C Yankanich Brad and Ryerson James T
ENTRY.COMMENT: bridle adjust,stlkd out,3-4p,bid7/16,fought on gamely,prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 82. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider i t inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUNEEN BAY three wide through the first turn, chased two then three wide from near the rear coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive issuing a challenge through the final furlong closing in on the once clear leader with a pair of rivals and was up in the final jump to the finish to prevail. KATIE'S CHECKRIDE three wide through the first turn, settled three wide in pursuit just off the pace, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, lugged inwards straightened away clear of any rival, issued a challenge through the final furlong and missed at the end. VOLATILITY attended the leader to the outside in the two path, took over command at the five-sixteenths and was set down taking the two path into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under threat from a trio and was nailed in the final strides by a pair. ADDRESSABLE MARKET (IRE) broke out at the start bumping IT WASN'T ME, tracked the pace along the inside from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. IT WASN'T ME got bumped at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. EXOTIC CAT saved ground at the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. BETTER JUSTICE just off the inside tracking from just off the pace, came under coaxing near the quarter pole to keep pace with KATIE'S CHECKRIDE to her outside, swung three wide into upper stretch as that rival went four wide and came inwards bumping the retreating AVALANCE IS COMIN, then stayed on one paced through to the finish. KEEP IT SEXY broke open the stall door of the starting gate prior to the start, tracked the pace along the inside just off the top pair, had the leader begin to stop and was caught behind her and shuffled back from inside the five-sixteenths to the quarter pole before being able to tip to the two path around that foe straightened away, then made no late headway. RAPID MISS TAPIT just off the inside through the first turn, chased three paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and offered no response. AVALANCHE IS COMIN established the front and was rated along on the pace along the inside, yielded the front just inside five-sixteenths to run, faded and was bumped by BETTER JUSTICE after straightened away into upper stretch along the inside route, then folded in the stretch. There was a Jockey's Objection by the rider of BETTER JUSTICE alleging interference against KATIE'S CHECKRIDE in upper stretch. After review the objection was dismissed and the result was allowed to stand prior to the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Keep It Sexy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, shuffled near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Avalanche Is Comin
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside on pace, yielded 5/16, bumped uppr str, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Better Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 3w upper, bumped foe, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Rapid Miss Tapit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, chased 3w, coaxed ins 5/16, 4w uppr, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Addressable Market (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, tracked ins, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: It Wasn't Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Duneen Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 2-3w, 3w far turn, 6w uppr, up last jump

ENTRY.NAME: Volatility
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended 2p, up ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, edged clear, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Exotic Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 5/16, angled 6-7w upper, by tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's Checkride
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w both turns, chased 3w, coaxed near 1/4, 4w upper, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 39000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOLLY MISS JILL broke out at the start, pressed the pace on the outside, dropped back late on the backstretch, chased in the three path on the turn, took the advantage into upper stretch, shook clear while remaining on her inside lead until near the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead and proved best under steady urging. AMITY ISLAND settled at the rear of the field, was urged two then three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and finished willingly for the place. MAGGIE was hustled from the gate, established a good position just off the pace, saved ground on the turn, moved out into upper stretch, pursued the winner in the drive and lacked the needed kick then just missed the place. DUFRESNE broke out at the start, was coaxed to the front, set the pace under pressure to her outside, vied in the two path on the turn, was asked near the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage into upper stretch and weakened. LUNA LOCA was coaxed along off the pace, raced in the two path under stronger encouragement on the turn and lacked the needed response. EXOGEN brushed the outside of the gate at the start, settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn, shifted three wide into the stretch, remained on her left-lead in the drive and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dufresne
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,set pressured pace,2p turn,headed3/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well placed,inside turn,mvd out 1/4,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Amity Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled at rear,urged 2-3path turn,4w into lane,willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Loca
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo God's Glory Stables and Arenas Cristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed along,urged 2path turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Exogen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate,settled,inside turn,3w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Miss Jill
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,pressed outside,chsd 3p turn,lead3/16,edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6F Outer turf CR: 86. Allowance Purse 80000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTUMN GLORY chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, angled five to six wide into upper stretch let out for the drive, rallied in tandem with LINARITE, had that rival lean in on her in the late stages and was up in the final jumps to prevail. LINARITE chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch, rallied leaning on the aforementioned foe inside the final sixteenth and missed at the end. WEEKEND RAGS chased three wide, got let out spinning five to six wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong from home, dug in under threat from a pair and was nailed in the final jumps to the wire. LATEST EDITION five paths off the inside in closest aim of the leader, tucked to the two and advanced in the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch taking command straightened away, got collared for the front a furlong out, ran on to the finish. BELLA PRINCIPESSA coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung seven wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced. ROYAL DANCER chased along the inside, had THREE UNIONS tuck to be directly in front from the five path to the rail near the half mile pole and got placed in tight by BERN ROSEY BERN to her outside while being off heels of that leader, was unable to settle through until the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the final furlong. ROBYN AND ELI coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered no response. CANDY MONET coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside, got forced to steady out at the nine-sixteenths as rivals tucked in from the outside losing about a length of position to the front, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the two path into upper stretch and weakened. BERN ROSEY BERN coaxed from the gate, chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went three wide into upper stretch, weakened. THREE UNIONS coaxed from the gate, showed the way narrowly five to six paths off the inside early on, tucked all the way to the inside at the half mile pole just when getting about a length clearance forcing rivals in tight and off heels inside that station, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, cut the corner into upper stretch yielding command straightened away and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Robyn and Eli
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond M Stable Throne Racing and Lianna Stables Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, in tight, off heels 1/2, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Monet
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, steady 9/16, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Linarite
ENTRY.OWNER: Punk, Jr., William J. and DiLeo, Philip
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 8w upper, leaned on foe, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Rags
ENTRY.OWNER: NY Final Furlong Racing Stable and WLIR Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, let out 5-6w upper, up 1/8p, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Bern Rosey Bern
ENTRY.OWNER: Nice Guys Stables Al Bianchi Racing LLC and BayTree Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Principessa
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3w, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Latest Edition
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 2p turn, coax 5/16, up 4w uppr, collared, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Three Unions
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable and Mitre Box Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 5-6w, to ins 1/2, cut corner, yielded, falter

ENTRY.NAME: Autumn Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w backstretch, 2p turn, 5-6w upper, leaned on late, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUOKKA was taken in hand early, prompted the pace on the outside in the two path, was asked on the far turn, bumped soundly with HOULTON in upper stretch, dueled with that opponent under a drive into the final sixteenth and gamely prevailed. HEARTENED went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused three to four wide on the far turn, rallied outside into the final furlong, drifted in while gaining fast near the sixteenth-pole and just missed. RIGHT TO VOTE went two then three wide on the frrist turn, settled on the outside, was roused three then four wide on the far turn, rallied outside into the final furlong and closed strongly to just miss while up for the show. HOULTON went to the front, showed the way along the rail while inside of a foe, was asked near the quarter-pole, bumped soundly with a rival in upper stretch, dueled with that foe into the final sixteenth and just missed. MARCEAU saved ground under restraint on the first turn, was rated just off the pace, traveled around the far turn in the two path, moved out while asked for his best in upper stretch, rallied into the final furlong, gained between horses into the final sixteenth and missed while in tight in traffic at the finish. LIVE TO RIDE (GB) went around the first turn in the two path, settled at the rear, angled from three to five wide on the far turn, gained in the stretch and improved position with late energy. ROCKET NIGHT moved in early, was rated on the inside, came under encouragement on the far turn and lacked the needed kick. SKYLER'S ARTEMIS tossed his head while tugging at the bit nearing the first turn, went three wide on that bend, was rated on the outside, came under urging with three furlongs to run, chased three wide on the far turn and weakened. TEAM CAPTAIN was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, saved ground towards the rear, moved out in upper stretch and was no factor. MIGHTY GLORY dropped in early, settled in the two path, was roused on the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Houlton
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,ins foe,ask1/4,bmpd soundly3/16,dueled,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Quokka
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,prompt out 2p,ask2nd turn,dueled,led,just held

ENTRY.NAME: Live to Ride (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,at rear,3-5w2nd turn,gained,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Marceau
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,rated,ask2p2nd,mvd out3/16,rally btwn,in tight wire

ENTRY.NAME: Team Captain
ENTRY.OWNER: Black Type Thoroughbreds Swinbank Stables Adkisson Steve and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,towards rear,inside turns,mvd out,no factor

ENTRY.COMMENT: toss head 6-1/2,3p1st,rated out,ask3/8,chsd 3w2nd,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,rated inside,asked 2nd turn,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Glory
ENTRY.OWNER: Sal-Lou J G Stable Rosenthal Robert D Rosenthal Peter and Greenberg Martin
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,settled 2path,asked 2nd turn,4w into lane,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Right to Vote
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3p1st,settled outside,ask3-4w2nd,rallied,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Heartened
ENTRY.OWNER: St Elias Stable Langone Ken Duncker C Steven and Vicarage Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,ask 3-4w2nd,rallied,drift in 1/16,missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 82. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MURSAL seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, rallied in tandem with ICY REPLY to overthrow the leader just inside the eighth pole, seized command and was bumped a sixteenth out and gamely prevailed at the finish. ICY REPLY four then three wide in pursuit, got set down spinning four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the eighth pole, dug in under threat head to head and bumped with MURSAL when that rival took command a sixteenth out, fought on to the wire. ROMAN GODDESS chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. BOSS LADY KIM coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and relented just inside the eighth pole, weakened in the late stages. VAX chased along the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coaxed along from midway, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, offered no response. GHOSTLY GIRL seven to eight paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch and weakened. TRY IT AGAIN coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Vax
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3w 3/8, 4-5w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Try It Again
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R and Witz Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Lady Kim
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Reply
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, set down 4w upper, up ins 1/8, caught, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Mursal
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi, Vincent S. and Gabrielle Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 5w turn, 6w upper, up 1/16, bumped, game

ENTRY.NAME: Roman Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Toscano Jr John T Calia Richard and Salisbury Timothy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7-8w backstretch, 5w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1 1/8M Outer turf CR: 96. Allowance Purse 80000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 12 4 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIMBUKTU was reserved on the outside in the three to four path, came under urging near the five-sixteenths, gained to make a bid into the stretch then took the lead at the three-sixteenths, responded well under threat from the runner-up in the final furlong and held under strong urging. ONE HEADLIGHT broke out but was corrected very quickly by the rider, rounded the first turn in the two path, was reserved towards the rear, went three then four wide on the far turn, came six wide into the stretch, rallied outside to make a bid into the final furlong, fought outside the winner to the finish and missed. LAUREL VALLEY was asked from the gate then taken in hand early, tugged keenly at the bit then was taken back before the first turn, raced in the two path while rated off the pace, drafted behind horses on the far turn, waited into upper stretch, was roused inside the three-sixteenths and willingly earned the place. INDIAN MISCHIEF was hustled from the gate then taken under a snug hold, tracked the leader while rated outside in the two path, took the advantage at the three-eighths pole, lost the advantage in upper stretch, dropped back into the final sixteenth and weakened. LACHAISE bumped with an opponent at the start, was reserved in the two to three path, raced between horses on the far turn, came four wide into the stretch and gained mildly but failed to impact. CLEAR CONSCIENCE stumbled outward at the start then bumped with a foe, was reserved on the inside, angled out four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. KINGDOM ON PAWS settled on the outside while three to four wide, made a bid on the far turn, dropped back under a drive in upper stretch and tired. GEM MINT TEN was taken in hand early then reserved on the inside, came out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. SPIRITUAL KING went to the front, showed the way on the inside, lost the lead with three furlongs to run and gave way. DR. MARBOOZ was bumped on both sides at the start then pinched back, angled in at the rear, went around the turns in the two path and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Gem Mint Ten
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club and Cutair Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,reserved inside,mvd out 3/16,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,snug hold,rated out 2p,lead3/8,headed3/16,outfinished

ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled,taken back,rated 2p,draft 2nd turn,wait1/4-3/16,willingly

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,2p1st,reserved,3-4p2nd,6w1/4,rallied,bid1/8,missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved outside,3-4w,ask2nd turn,bid1/4,lead3/16,responded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWO REDHEADS seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn, got set down spinning four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command at the three-sixteenths, drew clear under a drive to prevail. MONTAUK MYSTIQUE chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. EASTERN STAR got away to an awkward beginning, showed the way narrowly from the five path until tucked to the two path at the nine-sixteenths placing a trio of rivals in tight briefly, showed the way through the turn and continued just off the inside into upper stretch, got displaced from the front with three-sixteenths to go and kept on to preserve the show honors. SWEET LIBERTY three wide down the backstretch, got placed in tight briefly at the nine-sixteenths, prompted the pace along the inside through the turn and into upper stretch, then weakened in the final furlong. GOTHAM GRAY chased along the inside, got put in tight briefly near the nine-sixteenths when EASTERN STAR tucked to the two path from the outside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. BANK HOLIDAY broke out at the start, chased just off the inside down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. STRANGE FRUIT chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, tired. MAXING THE BANK eight to nine paths off the inside down the backstretch, went four wide through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch and tired. DARLING CAT chased six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three to four wide through the turn, went eight wide into upper stretch, got out through the stretch and made no impact. COUNTESS CONSTANCE chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, made no impact. GOOD MORNING KISS chased six then five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, proved no factor. ARMY OF THOUGHTS chased four then two wide, was briefly in tight at the nine-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Gotham Gray
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Backstretch Seven Racing and Oak Hill Thoroughbred LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, in tight 9/16, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened
